name: mesh-tree
description: Utility functions for traversing the Medical Subject Heading (MeSH) tree

scripts.initdb-test: tar -xzf test/fixtures/mesh_subset.nt.tar.gz -C test/fixtures; node_modules/levelgraph-n3/import.js test/fixtures/mesh_subset.nt -o ./dbtest; rm test/fixtures/mesh_subset.nt
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && node_modules/.bin/babel --optional runtime src --out-dir dist
scripts.coverage: rm -rf coverage; NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/babel-node -r node_modules/.bin/isparta cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --compilers js:babel/register --bail

author: Sebastien Ballesteros <sebastien@standardanalytics.io>
